name: Tailwind CSS and Shadcn UI Rules
description: Rules for styling and UI components in Codenames project

conventions.class_ordering: Order classes: layout, spacing, sizing, typography, visual, interactive
conventions.responsive: Use mobile-first responsive design with breakpoint prefixes
conventions.dark_mode: Use dark: prefix for dark mode styles

conventions.component_structure: Follow Shadcn UI component structure with variants and styles
conventions.naming: Use kebab-case for component files (e.g., button.tsx)
conventions.props: Use Radix UI primitive props as base
conventions.styling: Use Tailwind CSS for component styling

conventions.typography: Use consistent font sizes and weights
conventions.animations: Use consistent animation durations and curves
